detail.text: Has malfunctioning {{link}}.
Has more prosthetic limbs than real ones.
Is covered in tattoos of city names from across the Pact Worlds.
Flaunts an entirely bedazzled outfit.
Constantly fidgets.
Leans heavily on a rusty painglaive.
Wears a frag grenade on a leather cord around their neck.
Doesn't look up from their comm unit while speaking.
Speaks with a thick Akitonian accent.
Has a {{link}} embedded in the center of their forehead.
Makes intense eye contact.
Flips through a brochure for a beach resort on {{link}}.
Shouts over their loud music that they don't turn down.
Has a truly remarkable number of piercings.
Drinks from a mug that says, "Don't talk to me until I've had my coffee".
Talks with their hands (or equivalent limbs).
Fiddles with a key ring filled with keys.
Reeks of hyperleaf.
Chews a big wad of bubblegum.
Is a close-talker.
Keeps checking their watch.
Speaks and moves slowly, as if they're wading through molasses.
Seems like they've seen some shit.
Carries a worn book with dog-eared pages.
Wears a baffling array of holy symbols.
Is really into Vesk metal.
Fears that everyone around them is slowly being replaced with reptoids.
Has recently been on a lot of unsuccessful first dates.
Has a micromanaging boss.
Has a very large family.
Dreams of seeing a colossi on {{link}}.
Thinks they are a witchwarper.
Knows Kasathan battledancing.
Is stressed about their midterm exams.
Is in a petty squabble with their neighbor.
Has a weakness for greasy diner food.
Thinks they are being followed by an {{link}}.
Is very blunt.
Has gorgeous eyes.
Has an overbearing parent.
Has a giant tattoo of a void dragon.
Has a booming voice.
Is very sleepy.
Likes to show pictures of their pet squox.
Aspires to be a professional vidgamer.
Is a huge brutaris fan.
Bets on vithrar drone racing, a popular sport on Verces where people race drones at the speed of thought.
Just wants to go home.
Has tickets for an upcoming Strawberry Machine Cake concert.
Just submitted their audition vid for Zo!'s latest reality program.
Is working on a pre-Gap historical romance novel.
Can quote every line from Freedom and Fire, a Pact Worlds period drama about a dragonkin-android bonded pair.
Is days away from retirement.
Genuinely loves their job.
Tinkers with old scrap in their spare time.
Has a kid who's obsessed with the children's cartoon Nufriend Yufriend.
Has a massive sweet tooth.
Doesn't like nature.
Had too much to drink last night.
Lives for juicy gossip.
Tracks all the Infosphere rumors about the Ghost Levels.
Collects aucturnite.
